part.narration: The reviews for the first project are in. On the barren rooftop of Sega headquarters sits Nozomi. Yuki enters from the stairs. She twitches with every step toward her other.
Nozomi turns around gracefully — to Yuki she is a pretty thing — pretty people life size barbie dolls drawers full of waterproof mascara to suppress the tears —
part.line: Usually, I'm the one to scan all of the game reviews.
Now, our audience is American — unless you count Famitsu — which you shouldn't.
My English is not fit for written word.
I'll take care of it. It's a good thing you have me, huh?
part.narration: Nozomi looks down. Player's doing whatever. Camera occupy the screen with dear Nozomi's face.
part.line: Yeah, it's a good thing I have you—

choice.narration: Nozomi gasps and jumps and hugs and kisses Yuki on the neck, on the chin, on the cheek, on the anything!
choice.line: No, no, I have enough friends,
I have enough subordinates, enough groups, enough collectives!
I need a person! One person! An individual!
choice.narration: Nozomi shivers.Loop back to the first choice. "But thou must!" style.She doesn't want to hear about the Yuki not loving her.

part.narration: Player free. Nozomi is in the party.The two continue down the stairs and into the studio.
Enter Yuki and Nozomi holding hands. Shimizu turns to Nozomi.
part.line: I kissed a girl, and I liked it.
Where is our efficiency? Where is our discipline?
We need someone who doesn't just dump the work of discernment on others!
Dan, give her a stern talking to.
part.narration:
Dan sighs. He motions Nozomi over. Alright, let's go make Shimizu happy. Again. Dan and Nozomi go into the dark-windowed sound-recording room. Dan thwackes the lady over the hair with a rolled newspaper. The silhouette of Dan gives a thumbs-up. Shimizu gives back a thumbs-up. She turns to Yuki. We need to know how we're driving. Review these reviews. Shimizu hands Yuki the stack of magazines and web-printouts on the desk nearby. She looks over to the recording room. Oh— Dan points a finger! Nozomi gasps! The silhouette of Dan gives a thumbs-up. Shimizu returns a thumbs-up. Shimizu smiles. There are no distractions at the top, so take them to the roof. Dan and Nozomi now with cups of coffee, raise to toast. They take their swigs, pinky out. Shimizu looks over to the recording room— Oh, coffee down! Serious business! Nozomi cries! Dan comforts her! Brace for impact. Game journalism is often painful.
Yuki walks towards the recording-room. Sound-proofing isn't in the budget, it seems. Dan and Nozomi over coffee converse: Will you propose? I can't imagine a life where I won't. My dear old maid, hitching the Demoiselle! Nozomi giggles.
Yuki makes her way to the roof. Yuki reviews the reviews.
